Pre-Game Insights: Wizards are favored by 4.5 points in the matchup.
The Pelicans are favored by 4.5 points, but have only two wins ATS (2-2) as a 4.5-point favorite or greater this year.
As 4.5-point underdogs or more, the Wizards are 12-19 against the spread.
The Pelicans have an average total of 223.4 in its outings this year, 12.1 fewer points than this game’s over/under.
The average total for Washington’s games this season is 231.7 points, 3.8 fewer points than this game’s over/under.
The Pelicans score the 19th-most points in the league this season, while the Wizards’ offense racks up the 29th-most.
The Pelicans are the NBA’s 26th-ranked scoring defense while the Wizards are the 16th-ranked.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans have lost 15 straight road games.
This season, the Pelicans have been favored eight times and won three of those games.
The Wizards have won in six, or 18.8%, of the 32 contests they have been named as odds-on underdogs in this year.
This year, Washington has won five of 31 games when listed as at least +150 or better on the moneyline.
Others: The game tips at 6:00 PM ET on Sunday, January 5, 2025.
The game will be held at the Capital One Arena in Washington D.C.
The TV broadcast will be on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
